pages.text: $(item)Fruit Medley$() is a Fruit Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining any $(thing)Fruits$() with a total value of 3.0 or higher. Different from $(item)Fist Full of Jam$(), only no $(thing)Meats$() or $(thing)Vegetables$() should be added. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
